Detailed Description

Substance engine input texture structure.

Platform specific texture structure Pixel formats definitions include Contains platform specific texture and information about the format.

unsigned char SubstanceTextureInput::mipmapCount

Depth of the mipmaps (0: full pyramid, 1: only level0, etc.).
